code: import*as React from'react';import ReactDOM from'react-dom';import canUseDOM from"../../modules/canUseDom";function ModalPortal(props){var children=props.children;var elementRef=React.useRef(null);if(canUseDOM&&!elementRef.current){var element=document.createElement('div');if(element&&document.body){document.body.appendChild(element);elementRef.current=element;}}React.useEffect(function(){if(canUseDOM){return function(){if(document.body&&elementRef.current){document.body.removeChild(elementRef.current);elementRef.current=null;}};}},[]);return elementRef.current&&canUseDOM?ReactDOM.createPortal(children,elementRef.current):null;}export default ModalPortal;
